column1: Happy birthday to my friend @JimInhofe - thank you for your leadership and service to the people of Oklahoma!

Today we celebrate 245 years of the incomparable United States Marine Corps. The men and women who serve in the @USMC are some of the toughest and most impressive in our country. Thank you to all who serve! https://t.co/z7CNUTqNeD
I spoke with Jerad on Sunday as he battled this virus. All too soon he was taken from us.  Tammy and I extend our deepest condolences to Jenny and their young boys.
Jerad Lindsey was a great man and a great friend. His leadership impacted so many – both within law enforcement and around the community.
Congrats to #ACB! Tonight our nation celebrates the confirmation of an impressive woman of character and intellect to the Supreme Court. Big win for ALL Americans!
This is exactly why I introduced the #AmericaFIRSTAct - we need to get foreign influence out of American schools & force transparency from those who accept foreign money.   https://t.co/3U5ELEpPfm

According to TPD the situation at Woodland Hills Mall is under control and no tenants or customers have been harmed. I applaud @TulsaPolice for their swift action and dedication to keeping our community safe.
Happy 109th National Day to our friends in Taiwan!

Last week I introduced the Energy Poverty Prevention and Accountability Act (EPPA) with the goal of ensuring ALL Americans have access to affordable and reliable energy. I’m honored to have 17 co-sponsors (& counting!) support this common sense legislation.

Please join me in prayer for @realDonaldTrump & @FLOTUS as they recover from COVID-19. Like so many Americans the Trumps tested positive for the disease despite showing no symptoms. I have every hope their status will remain positive & they will both have a swift recovery.
Great work Ofc. Crosier! Fine example of Tulsa’s bravest working to keep us safe. https://t.co/MUhBifUutf
My prayers are with the two officers wounded in Louisville last night.

In private Democrats are quick to support small biz relief bills like HR 8265 and they're incredibly frustrated with @SpeakerPelosi. But when it comes time to vote they do exactly what she tells them to – playing politics with the livelihoods of the American people.

My prayers are with the family and loved ones of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsberg. She was a dedicated public servant and showed remarkable resilience as she fought cancer these last several years. Many Americans were inspired by her life and legacy.

2 countries in the last month have restored a diplomatic relationship with Israel. First the UAE and now Bahrain. @realDonaldTrump is making historic progress for peace in the Middle East it’s incredible to see it happen!

I will #NeverForget the shock the horror the pain of first hearing about the attacks on America 19 years ago. Nearly 3000 lives taken too soon changing our world forever. Today we remember those heroes and the loved ones they left behind.

Insane abuses of power from un-elected bureaucrats trying to disrupt our peaceful transfer of power and undermine the Trump presidency before it even began. I’m glad we are finally seeing some justice & accountability I look forward to more. https://t.co/ab4kdNlBeh

@StenyHoyer There are 435 Members of the House elected by the people of our districts to serve for your benefit not at the whim of career politicians like Pelosi & Hoyer. My responsibility is to my constituents so I’ll be working in Oklahoma with you until our next vote is called.
@StenyHoyer If a vote is called next week I will be on the first plane to DC to cast my vote and fulfill my constitutional responsibility to my constituents.
@StenyHoyer I will continue to plan meetings and events with constituents back home and continue to hear your concerns and talk with you about the issues that matter to you.

@StenyHoyer Well I’m not going to sit on my hands & wait for Democrat leadership to tell me what to do. I am not going to cancel plans to meet with constituents back home in Oklahoma’s First District so that I can sit in my office waiting for as-yet-unknown legislation from Hoyer & Pelosi.

@StenyHoyer Democrats could cancel the district work period and schedule hearings debate and votes for next week but that’s not what they’re doing. Instead they’re leaving Members of Congress in the dark as to what’s happening telling us not to make plans.

Democrat Leader @StenyHoyer just told the entire House that “no one should schedule themselves for next week.”   What he wants is for House members to do nothing but wait for Speaker Pelosi to decide if we’re going to have a vote on new coronavirus legislation.
Great read from @marknilsstrand on the necessity of the House returning to work.   https://t.co/gqQgo1V59W

The outpouring of love for the Johnson & Zarkeshan families in Tulsa is truly incredible. Thank you to everyone who has lifted up these families in prayer & shown support for our law enforcement!  https://t.co/vnOoQ5bk0d

Officer Aurash Zarkeshan is on the mend! He's not out of the woods yet but Aurash began breathing without an intubator today which is an incredible step forward in his recovery. Keep Aurash in your prayers as he continues to heal.

This violence is absolutely the result of vile anti-police movements around the country. While police reform is certainly needed law enforcement is not the enemy. Killing cops will never be the answer.

Anti-police rhetoric across the country is dangerous and only encourages more of the violence we saw in Tulsa yesterday. With rioters shouting "kill cops" all over the country the heartbreaking reality is that this will not be the last act of violence against police.
This act of unspeakable violence is unacceptable. There is no defense for it and the criminal who shot these officers will be held accountable for his actions.

Officer Aurash Zarkeshan has only been an active member of the force for 6 weeks after graduating police academy in May. He has a servant's heart & finally achieved the goal he's been working towards for years. He is stable but not out of the woods yet. He needs our prayers.

Sgt. Craig Johnson is a leader among our police force & has served our community for more than 15 years. He is well known in the community for his dedication attention to detail and incredible compassion. He remains in critical condition. My prayers are with him & his family.

The fact that Senate Democrats won’t even agree to debate @SenatorTimScott s #JUSTICEAct proves all we need to know (even @SpeakerPelosi has said she'll work with GOP on it). It was never about creating real change it was always about politicizing an issue to the fullest extent.
@realDonaldTrump We welcome and value peaceful protesters - whether you're here in support of the President or against him.

With reports of agitators & rioters traveling across the country to protest @realDonaldTrump's rally this weekend I want to make one thing clear: if your goal is to cause harm & devastation to a community you do not belong to do not come here. You are not welcome in Tulsa.
In the midst of national unrest that has upended cities like Minneapolis Seattle & Atlanta Tulsa has proven to be a place of reason and peaceful discourse.
Great news! https://t.co/6x883okbUP

There’s been so much support for this legislation I’m looking forward to the chance to earn the support of my colleagues on both sides of the aisle. The only way to ensure the safety of our future is to put #AmericaFIRST

In addition I'm glad to have the support of 15 original co-sponsors: @RepMattGaetz @RossSpano @RepMoBrooks @congbillposey @RepChipRoy @DavidRouzer @DougLaMalfa @RepBrianBabin @RepMullin @RepScottPerry @VickyHartzler @RepTimBurchett @RepGregMurphy @RepDanBishop @RepMikeGarcia
I'm thankful to have the support of @NikkiHaley and @standamericanow - Ambassador Haley's leadership on these issues is unparalleled.

Last week I introduced the America FIRST Act to the House requiring universities & their faculty to disclose the funds they receive from foreign nations. There should be absolute transparency about any foreign influence on our education system!
Thank you for your support on this important legislation @NikkiHaley! https://t.co/evA8jgguiX
I’m tired of seeing American taxpayer dollars siphoned to far away countries without an ounce of loyalty towards us. Time reevaluate foreign aid to certain countries if we want to put #AmericaFirst
America needs to wake up to foreign adversaries mucking up trouble throughout the world. Projects like China’s Belt and Road initiative should be met with the highest scrutiny #AmericaFirst

China steals as much as $600 billion in intellectual property from America every year. Time to forcibly deny China access to those resources and expose those aiding a communist dictatorship #StrengtheningAmerica
@thomas_reese Feel free to give us a call or personally write in for a response from me here: https://t.co/mtHftBJs1G.

Voting present by proxy is an unconstitutional oxymoron. You are not “present” if you need to use a proxy! It’s hard to watch these hallowed chambers fall so low. We’ve taken steps to ensure the safety of our Members - it’s time to do our job & show up!  https://t.co/r5weKl0MBj
I can't help but laugh when I see so many colleagues use a proxy to vote "present" - it's an oxymoron! Why use the proxy at all?

I'm looking forward to the @NASA @SpaceX launch this afternoon! Great public-private partnership to send American astronauts into space from American soil! Congrats to my friend & fellow Tulsan @JimBridenstine on this incredible day! #LaunchAmerica

Tulsa continues to prove that we are the country’s next big cyber hub. Incredible talent and top-notch education opportunities are right here at home. Congrats to these talented @utulsa students on making it to championship round! https://t.co/xadCFO7gKh

“We need more prayer not less.” THANK YOU @realDonaldTrump for affirming the need to reopen our churches & houses of worship. There has never been a more consequential time for strong faith communities. I applaud the President’s leadership to declare places of worship ESSENTIAL!
Great news for Tulsa! Thank you @realDonaldTrump for your commitment to improving our infrastructure and to @GovStitt for working hard to make Oklahoma a Top Ten state! https://t.co/wCicNLfE6W

Congrats to my new colleagues on their swearing-in today! @MikeGarcia2020 @TomTiffanyWI  I was sworn in early so I know getting settled into your new job can feel like drinking from a firehose especially right now. I'm here if you need anything. Can't wait to meet you soon!
BREAKING: Tulsa is a finalist for @Tesla's new factory. #TeslainTulsa would be great new jobs and fantastic for our community. @elonmusk we'd love to welcome you to Tulsa!  https://t.co/bEUXHl0EOK

Stopped to talk with @NexstarDC to explain my ‘no’ votes on both bills we’re considering today. So much has changed about the way Congress functions; the Capitol is empty & our staff are remote but it’s nice to have conversations with the press in some semblance of normalcy. https://t.co/aXa8lK0m43
Thanks to our state’s great relationship with Taiwan we just received a shipment of more than 100000 medical masks. Thank you to our friends in Taiwan for this incredible donation!
War & Peace takes the average American 40 hours to read. It's shorter than the 1800-page bill @SpeakerPelosi introduced today.

Hey @elonmusk I heard you’re thinking of leaving California. Can’t say I blame you. You should add Tulsa to your list of potential new markets for @Tesla. It’s great to do business in Oklahoma!   Plus #TeslainTulsa just has a great ring to it.

I'm alarmed by the far-left policies @SpeakerPelosi continues to sneak into coronavirus relief bills including anti-Second Amendment gun control measures.  Check out my thoughts on this in the @dcexaminer -->  https://t.co/r07MpFh8io

Steny Hoyer said that he wants to move forward with bipartisan legislation... so how come he & @SpeakerPelosi are writing it behind closed doors without the input of any Republicans?   Bring the House back to work!

If you haven't yet go read @GOPLeader's 4-phase plan to get the House back to work. It's practical safe and helps us return to our constitutional duty.   The American people need Congress at work and they need it now.  https://t.co/1TE1pdLt2k
@ceconomou56 @JillCastilla @katybrennan @EdmondActive Chris give my office a call (202) 225-2211
Happy Birthday to my good friend and colleague @TomColeOK04! It's hard to celebrate big days right now but I'll save a gift for you when we get back to work in DC.

I'm in DC this morning for today's vote on the new funds for #PPPloans other SBA loans & COVID-19 testing. I'm proud to support a clean bill w/ no unrelated policy riders. Our small biz owners needed action from us weeks ago but I'm glad we're finally getting them this aid.
No other member is accountable to Oklahoma's 1st District no other member will be casting my vote. https://t.co/98fxz8tzfu

Yesterday PPP ran out of $. We saw this coming & tried to prevent it by passing add'l funds but @SenateDems blocked it. @SpeakerPelosi even bragged about it.  This is a complete forfeiture of leadership leaving small biz leaders behind when they need us most.
@crystal_seymore Crystal can you call my office (202) 225-2211? We'll help however we can.
@Mama_Bates Amy I'm working to get it done! Our small businesses need every dollar we can get them. In the meantime call my office if there's anything we can help you with. (202) 225-2211
The Paycheck Protection Program is starting to work. We must protect our small businesses & workers they're the ones who will lead the way when our economy reopens!  https://t.co/gQ7SmAuvmp
@Ryan7B Hey Ryan please call my office line (202) 225-2211.
@jogal82 @realDonaldTrump @GovStitt Hey Amanda give my office a call (202) 225-2211.We'll see what we can do to help.

To our small biz owners - regulations for the loans authorized in the #CARESAct should be coming out today. Go through your usual lender. Don't hesitate to contact my office if we can help - (202) 225-2211.
To the American people it's much later than anyone wanted but HELP IS ON THE WAY!  Watch my floor speech on the #CARESAct --> https://t.co/ojm0sXOhNs

It was sobering to be with the Oklahoma National Guard & the family of Technical Sgt. Marshal Roberts this morning as his remains arrived at the Tulsa Air National Guard Base. He paid the ultimate sacrifice to keep our country safe & free. We will never forget #TSgtMarshalRoberts https://t.co/tf66lNzR4h

#DearNancyPelosi  Do you find it hypocritical to call out poison pills in the Senate bill (which there are none - it was a very bipartisan process) when just 2 weeks ago we had to wait 48+ hours to vote bc you littered the legislation with poison pills that had to be removed?

#DearNancyPelosi   How do wind and solar tax credits (meant to harm the oil & gas industry my district relies on - but that's a topic for another day) help the workers losing their paychecks right now as a result of #Covid19?

#DearNancyPelosi   Why did you tank a bipartisan stimulus package that could have passed the House & been signed by @realdonaldtrump ASAP? Was it the direct cash to suffering Americans or the much-needed aid to medical workers on the frontlines of #Covid19 that put you off?

#DearNancyPelosi   When the American people are looking to our leaders to protect them why are you focusing on expanding protections for illegal immigrants & restricting our border agents from keeping our country safe?

#DearNancyPelosi  Election Day is more than 7 months away. When you could focus on helping American small businesses survive this government-imposed restriction on non-essential services why are you wasting energy on same-day voter registration requirements?

#DearNancyPelosi   How will $600 MILLION to the National Endowment of the Arts & National Endowment of the Humanities help the students and teachers who will more than likely not return to their campuses this academic year?

#DearNancyPelosi   The #GreenNewDeal was overwhelmingly shot down in the Senate last year. Why are you caving to a freshman socialist and sneaking GND provisions into what should be a #Covid19 relief package?
#DearNancyPelosi  With millions of Americans out of work and wondering how to feed their families why are you increasing federal payments to Planned Parenthood?

#DearNancyPelosi  Where were you while the Senate worked day & night – with a strongly bipartisan task force – to create a stimulus package that provides aid directly to the people most impacted by #Covid19?

#DearNancyPelosi  Airline workers are in a crisis the industry is facing unprecedented losses. Instead of providing resources for those losing their jobs why are you wasting $100 MILLION on research into sustainable aviation fuels?
#DearNancyPelosi  With #Covid19 spreading through our country why do you want to divert $35 MILLION to the Kennedy Center in Washington DC?
#DearNancyPelosi   What good does a bailout of the Post Office do to the millions of Americans out of work and suffering from #Covid19?

Proud to join @RepJimBanks @sethmoulton & a bipartisan coalition in the House as a cosponsor of this resolution condemning the Chinese Communist Party not only for misleading the world on #Covid19 but pushing blame on the US with a propaganda campaign.  https://t.co/SlIvkYuRJX
In this fight against a global pandemic we are all on the same side. Congress should be moving forward in agreement but instead we are gridlocked in division.
This global pandemic requires swift action from Congress but that does not mean we act in haste.

When the President declares a state of emergency for our nation we do not abandon our posts and go home. We remain at the helm of our government doing everything we can to protect the American people.
The Senate has already called off their state work period next week and we should do the same.

Today I wrote a letter to @SpeakerPelosi urging her to keep Congress in session until we have a coronavirus bill that can be passed by the Senate and signed by @realDonaldTrump into law. My letter is linked here: https://t.co/VFWcWYo49o

@OralRobertsU There are approximately 500k unfilled jobs in these sectors today & ORU’s forward thinking has resulted in the revitalization of their Computer Science degree. I commend ORU’s investment into the future & look forward to seeing more ORU graduates fill these high paying jobs!
I am proud to see @OralRobertsU take the initiative to train up students for some of the most pressing labor force needs in the market computer science and cyber security.   https://t.co/Iu3O1DDwHg

A disagreement btwn the Middle Eastern oil cartel & Russia caused the largest stock market drop since '08. America must become more than energy-independent we need to be energy-dominant. Thanks to @realDonaldTrump's pro-America policies we are well on our way. #gopHEAT
A very happy birthday to my friend and fellow Oklahoman @SenatorLankford! He's a great leader for our state and serves us well in the United States Senate. Here's to many many more years!

Looking forward to speaking at the Cyber Summit with @utulsa in a couple weeks and meeting with the people on the leading edge of technology and cyber security. Tulsa is on our way to becoming the next cyber hub for our country! https://t.co/JJkuXEshOr
I woke up this morning to the news of a devastating tornado in Tennessee. Several lives lost many injured and vast amounts of property destroyed. My prayers are with you Nashville!
Would love to see an Oklahoman in the next generation of @NASA astronauts. If you ever wanted to #BeAnAstronaut now is your time! https://t.co/A5WPwnjMKy

Looks like some of my colleagues slept in this morning! At the @housebudgetGOP hearing the only Democrat to show up was the chairman. Shows exactly where their priorities are when it comes to  our constitutional responsibility to create a federal budget.

#ICYMI: I wrote a piece for the @tulsaworld this weekend highlighting why it's time for @HouseDemocrats to move on from impeachment & do the work we were elected to do. You can read it here --> https://t.co/amGQcWNIFI

It's #EngineersWeek! Last week I met with the deans of the engineering colleges at @okstate @UofOklahoma & @utulsa.   As a former engineer myself I'm proud to support the next generation of engineers & engineering students! https://t.co/chRL6rvKVQ
Great meeting with Luke Bray a @SpecialOlympics athlete from Owasso this morning. The Special Olympics have always been close to my heart and I am proud to support them! https://t.co/DzLzNYV9rm
You can see my full speech here --> https://t.co/iOXRnXGHbC

Last night I spoke on the House floor on the need to protect American workers give them freedom & independence. I was booed & heckled by Democrats.  They would rather protect illegal immigrants & give them union memberships (when they shouldn't be working here in the 1st place)
This long national nightmare is finally over and we can move on to the work of the people - lowering drug prices securing the border and making the 2017 tax cuts permanent. Let's get it done!

My administration has ended catch & release. - @realDonaldTrump  It's great to have a President commit to the safety of our people! More than just a border wall we must be adequately funding our border security! #SOTU

Our ICE officers arrested 120000 criminal aliens charged with nearly 10000 burglaries 5000 sexual assaults 45000 violent assaults and 2000 murders.   I support ICE & law enforcement professionals across the country working hard to keep our families safe! #SOTU

I join President Trump in calling for the passage of legislation to ban late-term and post-birth abortions!   "Whether we are Republican Democrat or Independent surely we must all agree that every human life is a sacred gift from God!" - @realDonaldTrump #SOTU
We will eradicate the AIDS epidemic in America by the end of the decade. - @realDonaldTrump #SOTU
President Trump is addressing the rising costs of healthcare & pharmaceuticals in a way that will help the American people access excellent & affordable care. #SOTU https://t.co/2HfzeYm4tw
Touching moment to see General McGee & his great-grandson Iain representing the historic strength & innovative future of the American military tonight as @realDonaldTrump's guests. #SOTU
Our President and our government support Juan Guaido & the freedom of Venezuela. Socialism is a destroyer. We must work to ensure it never destroys the country we call home. #SOTU
Great quote from @realDonaldTrump --> "As we restore American leadership throughout the world we are once again standing up for freedom in our hemisphere." #SOTU
But unlike so many who came before me I keep my promises. - @realDonaldTrump #SOTU
#SOTU https://t.co/tQIo5WSTEz
7 million people off of food stamps 10 million off of welfare as a direct result of @realDonaldTrump's policies. We need to continue building on this! #SOTU
President Trump starting out strong! Our American economy is stronger than ever - lowest unemployment wages on the rise& more tax dollars in your pocket. #SOTU

Kicking off the media rush of the next couple of days with some Oklahomans! Great talking with @GaylordNews this afternoon about #SOTU tomorrow’s impeachment vote & what happens when we finally move on from this circus. https://t.co/akO4vkDG5u

Are you tuning in to the State of the Union tonight? With our roaring economy the future has never been brighter for middle class families in America.   I'm looking forward to hearing what @realDonaldTrump has to say! #SOTU   https://t.co/RT2fCtBVDP

When I first saw this I thought it was a headline from @TheOnion  ... turns out it's a legitimate move from @HouseDemocrats to silence anyone who disagrees with them. You can't make this stuff up! https://t.co/Cr6dwdBQpv

#MarchforLife is happening in DC today! I’m in Oklahoma but my thoughts are with everyone standing up for life. Incredible to see @realDonaldTrump address the attendees - 1st POTUS to do it. Thank you for supporting life!
